description:
One of a new concept in physics puzzle. So addictive that you can’t stop playing, still 99% can't win. Play and win if YOU CAN ! if not its a good time killer ㋡.

Wanna try the free version first ? here you go :
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shah.BnB

Go for Premium ad-free version here:
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.shah.BounceBang

Switch on your brain with this new puzzler! Shoot the cannon and bounce ball to destroy your enemy. Bounce n Bang is very addicting! It’s not a usual tap ball game; it’s one of the most addictive physics puzzles you will ever play! It is way fun for strategic thinking that will challenge your logic and mind skills. If you want to sharpen your brain and be smarter, try Bounce Off now!
✪ HOW TO PLAY✪
1. Aim your cannon to the right direction so the fireball will be bouncing to the right direction. 2. Place blockers to help you angle the projectile. 3. Press the Fire Button to shoot. 4. Watch out for evil King Kong & dragons on later levels. 5. Collect the Golden coin with star to get higher score. 6. You can replay each level for better scores.
